alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 4:56AM CDT until April 01 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow diminishing this morning. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Marinette County County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
